name: PlanetQuest: Complete Edition
description:
Story: Your ship’s engine is broken so you had to make an emergency landing on the mysterious Planet X247 in hopes of finding any useful technology that could fix your ship's broken engine.

Controls: Arrow keys to move and jump, Space to shoot, Enter to pause, Space when paused to reset room, M to mute audio.

Credits: The entire game and its graphics made by me using Construct 3. Sound effects from "Essential Retro Game Sound Pack" by Juhani Junkala.
